channel.title: Maps on Hoosier Mesh
channel.description: Recent content in Maps on Hoosier Mesh

item.title: Local Community
item.description:
Find nodes near you

Use these mesh maps to discover nodes in your area:

  • MeshMap.net - View the global mesh network with detailed node information
  • Liamcottle’s Meshtastic Map - Alternative map visualization

If you have a Discord account, you can also ask about other mesh users and nodes in specific areas on the Meshtastic Community Discord.

Regional community networks

Join other Indiana meshers on these regional networks:
